### ðŸ”€ CausalFlow
::: {.tool-status .live}
Live
:::
:::

An interactive visual tool for specifying **longitudinal causal models** and exporting them to lavaan syntax for Structural Equation Modeling (SEM) analysis in R.

**Features:**

- Drag-and-drop interface for building path diagrams
- Support for cross-lagged panel models
- Automatic lavaan syntax generation
- Export to R script

::: {.tool-tags}
`Causal Inference` `SEM` `R/lavaan` `Panel Data` `Interactive`
:::

:::
:::

### ðŸ“‹ QuizView
::: {.tool-status .live}
Live
:::
:::

A Next.js web app that lets you **preview and visualize Brightspace quiz CSV files** before uploading them to your LMS.

**Features:**

- Drag-and-drop CSV upload
- Visual preview of questions and answers
- Validation before upload
- Support for multiple question types

::: {.tool-tags}
`Teaching` `LMS` `Brightspace` `Next.js` `CSV`
:::
